amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Commission plan; proposal for adoption; frequency.
amendatorysection.para: If the proposition of adopting the commission plan of government is not adopted at the special election under section 19-402 by a majority vote, the question of adopting it shall not be again submitted in the same city within two years thereafter.
